question: 怒られる
sourceAnswer: To Get Angry, To Get Mad
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>angry</kanji>, the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to get angry</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: You're starting <vocabulary>to get angry</vocabulary> about something. It's mostly this <reading>ok</reading>ra (<ja>おこ</ja>). It tastes terrible.
